Panhandling songs & cold-hearted whiskey tunes for audience of the moon alone,  ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œTHE REAL MAN IN BLACKÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ features completely reworked covers of classics by Cramps, GG Allin, Johnny Cash, KMFDM, VNV Nation, Pink Floyd, Nine Inch Nails, Charles Manson & others + a slew of original material.
